name: A Walk In The Snow
description:
A quick adventure about a walk through the woods in the snow to get to a tree lighting ceremony for Christmas, with multiple endings!

Controls
  • "WASD" to move
  • "Esc" To return to the menu at any time.
Background

Second game made for my Second game jam. The goal of this jam was to refine some of the items that I felt comfortable with from my first and experiment with building new systems and features in UE4. The story leaves much to be desired, but that is how it goes with a game jam sometimes!
